page.title: 13ASTONS COACHES.
page.content: Aston's coach company which is based in Kempsey was formed in 1929. Today the company owns 20 coaches and 2 double decker buses. A good deal of the company's work every day takes the form of transporting people from outlying villages to work or school and 10 vehicles a day are allocated for this. The company also runs day excurisions throughout the year to various parts of the country and it is found that these are most popular with elderly people who would not otherwise have the chance to visit these places. Since 1981 the company has been running its own continental holidays and short excursions and these 'packages' have proved most popular. One reason for their popularity is that the 1980's has seen improvements in comfort standards in coach travel.
